p.d: On the verge of depression, Rita realises that she needs to sing. Ferraille suggests a musical project but too many people interfere with its fulfilment. Yolande, in search of a new look, gets noticed for a modelling job. Edmour awakens a desire in Lomer that's been buried for too long... Directed by: Jean-Marc Piché (season 2, Canada, 2019) Screenplay: Patricia Léger Cast: Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre: comedy
